bug.author: rohitsam
bug.description: ret,thresh = cv2.threshold(img,127,255,0) (as seen from <denchmark-link:http://docs.opencv.org/master/dd/d49/tutorial_py_contour_features.html#gsc.tab=0>opencv</denchmark-link> documentation ) returns the error too many values to unpack! it is returning more than 2 values hence it must be like _,ret,thresh = cv2.threshold(img,127,255,0) please update the <denchmark-link:http://docs.opencv.org/master/dd/d49/tutorial_py_contour_features.html#gsc.tab=0>documentation</denchmark-link>
